participant_1.background:
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
i volunteer walking dogs twice a week.
i have been acting since i was ten years old.
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my temper is pretty short.

participant_2.background:
I have a very close relationship with my family, and they are always there for me when I need them.
My favorite websites are ones that teach me about new places to climb and share recipes for brownies.
i like to eat hard boiled eggs.
i work for the railroad.
i can t live without my friends.

content.text: Hello! I'm a huge fan of video games, but I don't have that much time to play them anymore since I started working from home.
Hi! I'm a big fan of video games too, and I also love hiking. What's your favorite game?
My favorite game is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. It's a beautiful game with a huge open world. I love exploring and finding new things.
I've heard a lot of good things about that game! I've been meaning to check it out.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I'm also a big fan of the Assassin's Creed series.
Oh, I love Assassin's Creed too! I've played all of them except for the latest one.
The latest one is really good! It's set in Ancient Greece, and it's a lot of fun to explore the world.
I'll have to check it out! I'm also a big fan of the Batman Arkham series.
I love those games too! They're so well-made.
Yeah, they're definitely some of the best superhero games out there.
I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! I love talking about video games.
